text: Look at the animals they have one male and one female you dont see 2 male horse with each other or any other animals.    Not true. Over 1500 species observed that show some kind of homosexual activity, with numerous cases of gay life bonding pairs.    http://www.livescience.com/ 2534-sex-couples-common-wild.html    furthermore, different species seem to do it for different reasons:   http://www.sciencedaily.com/releases/ 2009/06/090616122106.htm
